ygData.subject: Re: New Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: YES you can buy Robes in Freeport at the Academy ..  . (wiz,mag,enc) the Sr. Apprentice robe is violet in color and I bought it for about 4PP and change. ...
ygData.messageBody:
YES you can buy Robes in Freeport at the Academy .. . (wiz,mag,enc)
the Sr. Apprentice robe is violet in color and I bought it for about 4PP and
change.

----- Original Message -----
From: Stefan Raets <SRAETS@...>
To: Eq_Wizards@Onelist. Com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 7:50 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] New Robes


> From: "Stefan Raets" <SRAETS@...>
>
> Does anyone know if I can buy a new set of Wizard's Robes in Freeport?
> I'm in Rivervale now, and none of the shops seems to be selling robes.
> I know I can find them in Erudin, but that's a long trip, and I think
> Freeport is just a bit closer. I don't care about the color (although
> I prefer the red ones from Erudin). I just need robes that will fit
> an Erudite.
>
> Aznyin
> Level 12 Erudite Wizard
> Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Want to learn more about your list users...?
> their opinions, interests, thoughts?
> http://www.onelist.com
> You can now survey them with our new User Survey Tool
> Check out our homepage for details.
>
